name: Elvez Manage Contents
author: Elvez Inc,

sections.description:
Manage to display contents by user status login or logout.

ユーザのログイン・ログアウト状態に応じてコンテンツの表示をコントロールできます。

KEY FEATURES

  • Shortcode to display contents only user logged-in.

PREMIUM FEATURES

  • Shortcode to display contents only user not logged-in.
  • Woocommerce Support:
    Manage content according to whether the user has purchased a product or not.

他にも使いやすいWordpressプラグインをご用意しています。
We provide other useful WordPress plugins.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/elvez-manage-contents directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Dashboard->Elvez Hide Entry Header to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
1.1.6

  • Fix subscription function.

1.1.5

  • Support Elvez role.

1.1.4

  • Support user agent to manager content display.

1.1.3

  • Update tested version.

1.1.2

  • Update SDK.

1.1.1

  • Fix to use common stylesheet.

1.1.0

  • Support woocommerce.
  • Update common SDK.

1.0.3

  • Add subscription.

1.0.2

  • Update stylesheet.

1.0.1

  • Render nested shortcodes.

1.0.0

  • Release the plugin.
